name: Meteor Night (Combined Critter Creations)
description:
Meteor Night is a Small Rapid Prototype developed over a Period of 2 weeks. The player has to run to the end of a Mario-esque 2D Platforming Level, avoiding the multiple variants of Meteors raining down upon them, destroying the landscape. Only one level was developed, and at the time, no audio was added. At this point there are no plans to continue development.

Controls
WASD - Up, Down, Left, Right
Spacebar - Jump
